original_text: They shall stumble over one another, as if to escape a sword, though none pursues. And you shall have no power to stand before your enemies.
korean_text: 그들은 쫓는 자가 없어도 칼 앞에 있음 같이 서로 짓밟혀 넘어지리니 너희가 원수들을 맞설 힘이 없을 것이요

sentences.original_text: They shall stumble over one another
as if to escape a sword
And you shall have no power
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 아무 힘도 없을 것이며
